data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Osjecko-Baranjska, Croatia a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Osjecko-Baranjska, Croatia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Osjecko-Baranjska. Through your servants plant 54 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 248,945 cultural Christians in the state of Osjecko-Baranjska to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Osjecko-Baranjska who will make disciples who make disciples.
Spirit, I pray that the Jew, Croatian-speaking people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Osjecko-Baranjska, Croatia.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the state of Osjecko-Baranjska to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.section_summary:
the state of Osjecko-Baranjska, Croatia has a population of 270,900.

We estimate Osjecko-Baranjska has 1,142 people who might know Jesus, 248,945 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 20,813 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 237 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Osjecko-Baranjska, Croatia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

location.name: Osjecko-Baranjska
